meanings.definition: Showing the most flags or banners
meanings.sent1: The parade float with the flaggiest decorations won first place.
meanings.sent2: The castle on the hill had the flaggiest display during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The flaggiest car in the race had so many flags that it looked like a moving rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the event was the flaggiest among all the attendees.
meanings.sent5: The flaggiest house on the street was easily recognizable from a distance.

meanings.definition: Having the most flags or banners
meanings.sent1: The flaggiest ship in the harbor was beautifully adorned with colorful flags.
meanings.sent2: During the celebration, the flaggiest building in town was lit up with festive banners.
meanings.sent3: The flaggiest cake at the party had tiny flag decorations on every layer.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps was the flaggiest anyone had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The flaggiest garden in the neighborhood was a sight to behold with flags fluttering in the wind.

meanings.definition: Most likely to flag or signal
meanings.sent1: The flaggiest tree in the forest was the tallest and could be seen from afar.
meanings.sent2: The flaggiest alarm system in the building was designed to alert everyone in case of danger.
meanings.sent3: The flaggiest student in the class always raised their hand first to answer questions.
meanings.sent4: Her bright smile was the flaggiest sign that she was happy.
meanings.sent5: The flaggiest lighthouse on the coast guided ships safely through the night.
